670250.name: Grashers
670250.description:
Plow through endless, fog-infested rooms as an interstellar custodian known as a Grasher in this twin-stick roguelike. With the help of a half-vacuum, half-cannon known as HADOS, inhale every last speck of junk, blast bizarre creatures known as foglins, and fling stuff in a randomly generated galaxy of endless possibilities. Beneath the fog lies the story of a universe where humans are scarce, foglins have run rampant, and the planet Earth appears to have gone missing.

VACUUM STUFF


Use a powerful vacuum device called HADOS to absorb surrounding objects, purify the air, and even suck up and fling away enemies and obstacles that stand in your way.

SHOOT MONSTERS


The galaxy is littered with oddball monsters known as foglins, reborn from discarded objects – and it’s your job to get rid of them. Engage in epic battles against formidable bosses to absorb their unique elemental powers, such as Paper and Glass, empowering HADOS with each victory!

UPGRADE!


Explore the cosmos, complete missions, and acquire precious Star Drops to permanently upgrade your abilities. Unlock a vast array of achievements to gain access to over 100 unique items, allowing you to combine and stack their effects. Level up however you choose!
670250.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
